mapper.select: SELECT mem_no, mem_name, mem_id, mem_pwd, mem_phone, mem_birth, mem_email, mem_gender, mem_rent_yn, mem_favorite, mem_class, reg_date, mod_date FROM member WHERE 1=1 AND mem_id = #{mem_id} AND use_flag = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member( mem_name, mem_id, mem_pwd, mem_phone, mem_birth, mem_email, reg_date, mod_date ) VALUES( #{mem_name}, #{mem_id}, #{mem_pwd}, #{mem_phone}, #{mem_birth}, #{mem_email}, now(), now() )
